page.title: 20Acknowledgements
page.content:
This{Domesday Project}entry was compiled by the children and teachers of{Willingham County Primary School with the help of parents and other members of the local community. Thanks are due for some of the historical facts to Mr.Alan Fawcitt, Mr.Dennis Jeeps and Dr.Smail. The teachers mainly concerned in the work were Mrs.F.M.Anderson, Mrs.V.C.Hope, Mr.P.Bell and Mr.H.R.Goodwin.
There is an interesting link between the original Domesday Book's instigator,{William the Conqueror,}and the block covered by this entry in that it was in a field near Willingham that William's army camped before proceeding over the Fen Causeway to attack{Hereward the Wake}and his followers who were encamped in the Isle of Ely.
